verses.name: Luke 21:27
verses.text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory.

verses.name: Luke 21:28
verses.text: And when these things begin to come to pass, then look up, and lift up your heads; for your redemption draweth nigh.

verses.name: Luke 21:29
verses.text: And he spake to them a parable; Behold the fig tree, and all the trees;

verses.name: Luke 21:30
verses.text: When they now shoot forth, ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand.

verses.name: Luke 21:31
verses.text: So likewise ye, when ye see these things come to pass, know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand.
